subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance sun position formula,solar position algorithm
body:
Jeff,

If you're willing to go a little farther, you can get more accurate with a
little work. Install libnova, an astronomical library, and then
genutahsky, my full-color Radiance sky module. Sun positions use a pretty
intense calculation, and are even color-shifted at low angles based on
turbidity.

http://libnova.sourceforge.net/
http://markjstock.org/radiance/

Mark
